Jun Yan is a Professor in the [Department of
Statistics](https://statistics.uconn.edu) at the [University of
Connecticut](https://uconn.edu). He earned his Ph.D. in
[Statistics](https://stat.wisc.edu)
from the [University of Wisconcin](https://wisc.edu).
He enjoys working with students and growing his [academic
pedigree](http://genealogy.math.ndsu.nodak.edu/id.php?id=80020).


## [UConn Sports Analytics Symposium 2024](https://statds.org/events/ucsas2024/)

## Research Interest
+ Network analytics
+ Spatial extremes
+ Survival analysis
+ Multivariate dependence
+ Clustered data analysis
+ Statistical Computing
* Applications in public health, finance, sports, and the environment
